DataElement.preferredName: Borg Scale Rating of Perceived Exertion Questionnaire Rating of Perceived Exertion Score 15 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the rate of their perceived exertion, using a 15 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Borg Scale Rating of Perceived Exertion Questionnaire Rating of Perceived Exertion Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A scale for the subjective scoring of perceived exertion that ranges from 6: No exertion at all to 20: Maximal exertion. This scale was developed for use with healthy individuals where the score, multiplied by 10, might give an approximation of exercise heart rate._A scale for a subject to rate their perception of the intensity of their own physical effort._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Borg Scale Rating of Perceived Exertion Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A scale for the subjective scoring of perceived exertion that ranges from 6: No exertion at all to 20: Maximal exertion. This scale was developed for use with healthy individuals where the score, multiplied by 10, might give an approximation of exercise heart rate.

Concepts.longName: Borg Scale Rating of Perceived Exertion Questionnaire
Concepts.definition: A scale for the subjective scoring of perceived exertion that ranges from 6: No exertion at all to 20: Maximal exertion. This scale was developed for use with healthy individuals where the score, multiplied by 10, might give an approximation of exercise heart rate.

Property.preferredDefinition: A scale for a subject to rate their perception of the intensity of their own physical effort.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A scale for a subject to rate their perception of the intensity of their own physical effort.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
